languages.text:
The Arch-Militant makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with a kick, dealing {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of weapon damage. This attack does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and counts as a single melee attack for the purposes of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatility{/g}.
This attack cannot be parried and will {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target 2 cells away.
languages.original_text:
Архмилитант совершает удар ногой в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, нанося {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} вместо урона от оружия. Этот удар не входит в лимит атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} и считается одиночной атакой в ближнем бою для "универсальности".
Эта атака {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} противника на 2 клетки. Ее нельзя парировать.

traits.locale_text: The Veteran makes a melee attack with a kick, dealing (TGH bonus + STR bonus) damage instead of weapon damage. This attack does not count toward the limit of attacks per turn and counts as a single melee attack for the purposes of Right Tool for the Job. This attack cannot be parried and will push the target 2 cells away.

The Veteran makes a melee attack with a kick, dealing <u>(TGH bonus + STR bonus)</u> damage instead of weapon damage. This attack does not count toward the attack limit per turn and counts as a single melee attack for the purposes of right tool for the job.
This attack cannot be parried and will push the target 2 cells away.

The Arch-Militant makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with a kick, dealing {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of weapon damage. This attack does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and counts as a single melee attack for the purposes of versatility.
This attack cannot be parried and will {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target 2 cells away.

The Veteran makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with a kick, dealing {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} damage instead of weapon damage. This attack does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and counts as a single melee attack for the purposes of right tool for the job.
This attack cannot be parried and will push the target 2 cells away.

The Arch-Militant makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with a kick, dealing {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of weapon damage. This attack does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and counts as a single melee attack for the purposes of versatility.
This attack cannot be parried and will {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target 2 cells away.

languages.text:
首席战士发动{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，猛踢敌人。此次攻击不会造成武器伤害，而会造成{uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。此次攻击被不计入每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}攻击上限，且被视为一次近战攻击，可以用来叠加{g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}“多才多艺“{/g}层数。
此次攻击无法被招架，而且会将目标{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}2格。
languages.original_text:
The Arch-Militant makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with a kick, dealing {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of weapon damage. This attack does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and counts as a single melee attack for the purposes of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatility{/g}.
This attack cannot be parried and will {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target 2 cells away.

traits.locale_text:
首席战士发动{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，猛踢敌人。此次攻击不会造成武器伤害，而会造成{uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。此次攻击被不计入每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}攻击上限，且被视为一次近战攻击，可以用来叠加“多才多艺”层数。
此次攻击无法被招架，而且会将目标{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}2格。

老兵发动{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，猛踢敌人，造成{uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9}点伤害，不再造成武器伤害。此次攻击被不计入每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}攻击上限，并且视为一次近战攻击，可以用来叠加“合适装备”层数。
此次攻击无法被招架，而且会将目标推开2格。

languages.text:
El Archimilitante lanza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} con una patada que inflige {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} en vez del daño por arma. Este ataque no cuenta para el límite de ataques por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} y cuenta como un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo individual para {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatilidad{/g}.
Este ataque ignora parada y {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empuja{/g} al objetivo 2 casillas.

This attack does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and counts as a single melee attack for the purposes of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatility{/g}.
This attack cannot be parried and will {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target 2 cells away.

traits.locale_text:
El Archimilitante lanza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} con una patada que inflige {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} en vez del daño por arma. Este ataque no cuenta para el límite de ataques por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} y cuenta como un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo individual para Herramienta adecuada.
Este ataque ignora parada y {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empuja{/g} al objetivo 2 casillas.

El veterano lanza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} con una patada que inflige {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} de daño en vez del daño por arma. Este ataque no cuenta para el límite de ataques por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} y cuenta como un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo individual para Herramienta adecuada.
Este ataque ignora parada y empuja al objetivo 2 casillas.

languages.text:
アーク・ミリタントがキックで{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行い、武器ダメージの代わりに{uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。この攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとの攻撃制限数にカウントされず、汎用性による1回の近接攻撃としてカウントされる。
この攻撃は受け流し不可で、ターゲットを2セル分{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}突き飛ばす{/g}。
languages.original_text:
The Arch-Militant makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with a kick, dealing {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of weapon damage. This attack does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and counts as a single melee attack for the purposes of versatility.
This attack cannot be parried and will {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target 2 cells away.

traits.locale_text:
古参（ベテラン）がキックで{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行い、武器ダメージの代わりに<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} ボーナス）</u>ダメージを与える。この攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとの攻撃制限数にカウントされず、適切な手段による1回の近接攻撃としてカウントされる。
この攻撃は受け流し不可で、ターゲットを2セル分突き飛ばす。

古参（ベテラン）がキックで{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行い、武器ダメージの代わりに{uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9}ダメージを与える。この攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとの攻撃制限数にカウントされず、適切な手段による1回の近接攻撃としてカウントされる。
この攻撃は受け流し不可で、ターゲットを2セル分突き飛ばす。

languages.text:
Архмилитант совершает удар ногой в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, нанося {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} вместо урона от оружия. Этот удар не входит в лимит атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} и считается одиночной атакой в ближнем бою для {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}универсальности{/g}.
Эта атака {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} противника на 2 клетки. Ее нельзя парировать.

traits.locale_text:
Архмилитант совершает удар ногой в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, нанося {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} вместо урона от оружия. Этот удар не входит в лимит атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} и считается одиночной атакой в ближнем бою для {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}универсальности{/g}.
Эта атака {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} противника на 2 клетки. Ее нельзя парировать.

Ветеран совершает удар ногой в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, нанося <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g} + бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}СИЛ{/g})</u> урона вместо урона от оружия. Этот удар не входит в лимит атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} и считается одиночной атакой в ближнем бою для "подходящего способа".
Эта атака отбрасывает противника на 2 клетки. Ее нельзя парировать.

Ветеран совершает удар ногой в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, нанося {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} урона вместо урона от оружия. Этот удар не входит в лимит атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} и считается одиночной атакой в ближнем бою для "подходящего способа".
Эта атака отбрасывает противника на 2 клетки. Ее нельзя парировать.

languages.text:
Der Erzmilitant führt einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} per Tritt aus, womit er {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} anstatt Waffenschaden zufügt. Dieser Angriff zählt nicht zum Angriffslimit pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} und gilt für Zwecke der {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Vielseitigkeit{/g} als Einzel-Nahkampfangriff.
Dieser Angriff kann nicht pariert werden und {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}stößt{/g} das Ziel 2 Felder weg.
languages.original_text:
The Arch-Militant makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with a kick, dealing {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of weapon damage. This attack does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and counts as a single melee attack for the purposes of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatility{/g}.
This attack cannot be parried and will {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target 2 cells away.

traits.locale_text:
Der Erzmilitant für einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} per Tritt aus, womit er {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} anstatt Waffenschaden zufügt. Dieser Angriff wird dem Angriffslimit pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} nicht angerechnet und gilt zum Zwecke von Das richtige Werkzeug für den Job als Einzel-Nahkampfangriff.
Dieser Angriff kann nicht pariert werden und {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}stößt{/g} das Ziel 2 Felder weg.

Der Veteran für einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} per Tritt aus, womit er {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} Schaden anstatt Waffenschaden zufügt. Dieser Angriff wird dem Angriffslimit pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} nicht angerechnet und gilt zum Zwecke von Die richtige Methode für den Job als Einzel-Nahkampfangriff.
Dieser Angriff kann nicht pariert werden und stößt das Ziel 2 Felder weg.

languages.text:
L'archimilitant lance une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} en donnant un coup de pied qui inflige {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} au lieu des dégâts de l'arme. Cette attaque n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} et est comptabilisée comme une attaque de mêlée simple pour {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Polyvalence{/g}.
Cette attaque ne peut pas être parée et {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousse{/g} la cible de 2 cases.
languages.original_text:
The Arch-Militant makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with a kick, dealing {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of weapon damage. This attack does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and counts as a single melee attack for the purposes of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatility{/g}.
This attack cannot be parried and will {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target 2 cells away.

traits.locale_text:
Le Vétéran lance une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} en donnant un Coup de pied qui inflige <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g} + bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g})</u> points de dégâts au lieu des dégâts de l'arme. Cette attaque n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} et est comptabilisée comme une attaque de mêlée simple pour Outil Adéquat.
Cette attaque ne peut pas être parée et elle repousse la cible de 2 cases.

Le Vétéran lance une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} en donnant un Coup de pied qui inflige {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} points de dégâts au lieu des dégâts de l'arme. Cette attaque n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} et est comptabilisée comme une attaque de mêlée simple pour Outil Adéquat.
Cette attaque ne peut pas être parée et elle repousse la cible de 2 cases.

languages.text:
Başmilitan, tekme savurarak bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} yapar ve saldırı silah hasarı yerine {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Bu saldırı, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} başına saldırı sınırından sayılmaz ve "{g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}çok yönlülük{/g}" için tek bir yakın dövüş saldırısı olarak kabul edilir.
Bu saldırı savuşturulamaz ve hedefi 2 hücre uzağa {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}iter{/g}.

The Arch-Militant makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with a kick, dealing {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of weapon damage. This attack does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and counts as a single melee attack for the purposes of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatility{/g}.
This attack cannot be parried and will {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the target 2 cells away.
